name: Tic Tac Twisted
description:
Tic Tac Toe but played on a cube! 

Take turns as red and blue selecting squares, and also rotating the rows and columns to try and make three in a row.

Game is played with the mouse, but you can also use the Space bar to activate the 'pass' button.

/////////////////////////////////////////////////

Coding and art by Ryan Sullivan.

Background space imagery courtesy of Nasa.gov 

Submitted as part of the 'Stop Waiting for Godot' game jam hosted by Terry Cavanagh.

///////////////////////////////////////////////

I hope to someday expand this and include online multiplayer, but for now it is local multiplayer only. (Although since this game is played with no hidden information, it can easily be played over Twitch or Zoom).

Enjoy!
